name: The Fates
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/The Fates

sections.body: This card enables the character to avoid even an instantaneous occurrence if so desired, for the fabric of reality is unraveled and respun. Note that it does not enable something to happen. It can only stop something from happening or reverse a past occurrence. The reversal is only for the character who drew the card; other party members may have to endure the situation.
